Question: AFES Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AFES Co., Ltd

CES 2024

- AFES Co., Ltd will showcase their latest CES 2024 product featuring advanced AI technology for smart home integration and energy efficiency.
- The product boasts voice control and seamless connectivity with other smart devices.
- It offers enhanced security features and personalized user experience.
- The CES 2024 product also includes energy monitoring and management capabilities for optimized power consumption.
